269 void InitializeActions()
270 {
271 m_InputActionMap = m_ItemTypeActionsMap.Get( this.Type() );
272 if (!m_InputActionMap)
273 {
274 TInputActionMap iam = new TInputActionMap;
275 m_InputActionMap = iam;
276 SetActions();
277 m_ItemTypeActionsMap.Insert( this.Type(), m_InputActionMap);
278 }
279 }

281 override void GetActions(typename action_input_type, out array<ActionBase_Basic> actions)
282 {
283 if (!m_ActionsInitialize)
284 {
285 m_ActionsInitialize = true;
286 InitializeActions();
287 }
288
289 actions = m_InputActionMap.Get(action_input_type);
290 }

292 void SetActions()
293 {
294 AddAction(ActionTakeItem);
295 AddAction(ActionTakeItemToHands);
296 AddAction(ActionWorldCraft);
297 //AddAction(ActionWorldCraftSwitch);
298 AddAction(ActionDropItem);
299 AddAction(ActionAttachWithSwitch);

303
304 void AddAction(typename actionName)
305 {
306 ActionBase action = ActionManagerBase.GetAction(actionName);
307
308 if (!action)
309 {
310 Debug.LogError("Action " + actionName + " dosn't exist!");
311 return;
312 }
313
314 typename ai = action.GetInputType();
315 if (!ai)
316 {
317 m_ActionsInitialize = false;
318 return;
319 }
320
321 array<ActionBase_Basic> action_array = m_InputActionMap.Get( ai );
322 if (!action_array)
323 {
324 action_array = new array<ActionBase_Basic>;
325 m_InputActionMap.Insert(ai, action_array);
326 }
327 if ( LogManager.IsActionLogEnable() )
328 {
329 Debug.ActionLog(action.ToString() + " -> " + ai, this.ToString() , "n/a", "Add action" );
330 }
331
332 if (action_array.Find(action) != -1)
333 {
334 Debug.Log("Action " + action.Type() + " already added to " + this + ", skipping!");
335 }
336 else
337 {
338 action_array.Insert(action);
339 }
340 }
341
342 void RemoveAction(typename actionName)
343 {
344 PlayerBase player = PlayerBase.Cast(GetGame().GetPlayer());
345 ActionBase action = player.GetActionManager().GetAction(actionName);
346 typename ai = action.GetInputType();
347 array<ActionBase_Basic> action_array = m_InputActionMap.Get( ai );
348
349 if (action_array)
350 {
351 action_array.RemoveItem(action);
352 }
353 }

359 // Loads muzzle flash particle configuration from config and saves it to a map for faster access
360 void LoadParticleConfigOnFire(int id)
361 {
362 if (!m_OnFireEffect)
363 m_OnFireEffect = new map<int, ref array<ref WeaponParticlesOnFire>>;
364
365 if (!m_OnBulletCasingEjectEffect)
366 m_OnBulletCasingEjectEffect = new map<int, ref array<ref WeaponParticlesOnBulletCasingEject>>;
367
368 string config_to_search = "CfgVehicles";
369 string muzzle_owner_config;
370
371 if ( !m_OnFireEffect.Contains(id) )
372 {
373 if (IsInherited(Weapon))
374 config_to_search = "CfgWeapons";
375
376 muzzle_owner_config = config_to_search + " " + GetType() + " ";
377
378 string config_OnFire_class = muzzle_owner_config + "Particles " + "OnFire ";
379
380 int config_OnFire_subclass_count = GetGame().ConfigGetChildrenCount(config_OnFire_class);
381
382 if (config_OnFire_subclass_count > 0)
383 {
384 array<ref WeaponParticlesOnFire> WPOF_array = new array<ref WeaponParticlesOnFire>;
385
386 for (int i = 0; i < config_OnFire_subclass_count; i++)
387 {
388 string particle_class = "";
389 GetGame().ConfigGetChildName(config_OnFire_class, i, particle_class);
390 string config_OnFire_entry = config_OnFire_class + particle_class;
391 WeaponParticlesOnFire WPOF = new WeaponParticlesOnFire(this, config_OnFire_entry);
392 WPOF_array.Insert(WPOF);
393 }
394
395
396 m_OnFireEffect.Insert(id, WPOF_array);
397 }
398 }
399
400 if ( !m_OnBulletCasingEjectEffect.Contains(id) )
401 {
402 config_to_search = "CfgWeapons"; // Bullet Eject efect is supported on weapons only.
403 muzzle_owner_config = config_to_search + " " + GetType() + " ";
404
405 string config_OnBulletCasingEject_class = muzzle_owner_config + "Particles " + "OnBulletCasingEject ";
406
407 int config_OnBulletCasingEject_count = GetGame().ConfigGetChildrenCount(config_OnBulletCasingEject_class);
408
409 if (config_OnBulletCasingEject_count > 0 && IsInherited(Weapon))
410 {
411 array<ref WeaponParticlesOnBulletCasingEject> WPOBE_array = new array<ref WeaponParticlesOnBulletCasingEject>;
412
413 for (i = 0; i < config_OnBulletCasingEject_count; i++)
414 {
415 string particle_class2 = "";
416 GetGame().ConfigGetChildName(config_OnBulletCasingEject_class, i, particle_class2);
417 string config_OnBulletCasingEject_entry = config_OnBulletCasingEject_class + particle_class2;
418 WeaponParticlesOnBulletCasingEject WPOBE = new WeaponParticlesOnBulletCasingEject(this, config_OnBulletCasingEject_entry);
419 WPOBE_array.Insert(WPOBE);
420 }
421
422
423 m_OnBulletCasingEjectEffect.Insert(id, WPOBE_array);
424 }
425 }
426 }
427
428 // Loads muzzle flash particle configuration from config and saves it to a map for faster access
429 void LoadParticleConfigOnOverheating(int id)
430 {
431 if (!m_OnOverheatingEffect)
432 m_OnOverheatingEffect = new map<int, ref array<ref WeaponParticlesOnOverheating>>;
433
434 if ( !m_OnOverheatingEffect.Contains(id) )
435 {
436 string config_to_search = "CfgVehicles";
437
438 if (IsInherited(Weapon))
439 config_to_search = "CfgWeapons";
440
441 string muzzle_owner_config = config_to_search + " " + GetType() + " ";
442 string config_OnOverheating_class = muzzle_owner_config + "Particles " + "OnOverheating ";
443
444 if (GetGame().ConfigIsExisting(config_OnOverheating_class))
445 {
446
447 m_ShotsToStartOverheating = GetGame().ConfigGetFloat(config_OnOverheating_class + "shotsToStartOverheating");
448
449 if (m_ShotsToStartOverheating == 0)
450 {
451 m_ShotsToStartOverheating = -1; // This prevents futher readings from config for future creations of this item
452 string error = "Error reading config " + GetType() + ">Particles>OnOverheating - Parameter shotsToStartOverheating is configured wrong or is missing! Its value must be 1 or higher!";
453 Error(error);
454 return;
455 }
456
457 m_OverheatingDecayInterval = GetGame().ConfigGetFloat(config_OnOverheating_class + "overheatingDecayInterval");
458 m_MaxOverheatingValue = GetGame().ConfigGetFloat(config_OnOverheating_class + "maxOverheatingValue");
459
460
461
462 int config_OnOverheating_subclass_count = GetGame().ConfigGetChildrenCount(config_OnOverheating_class);
463 array<ref WeaponParticlesOnOverheating> WPOOH_array = new array<ref WeaponParticlesOnOverheating>;
464
465 for (int i = 0; i < config_OnOverheating_subclass_count; i++)
466 {
467 string particle_class = "";
468 GetGame().ConfigGetChildName(config_OnOverheating_class, i, particle_class);
469 string config_OnOverheating_entry = config_OnOverheating_class + particle_class;
470 int entry_type = GetGame().ConfigGetType(config_OnOverheating_entry);
471
472 if ( entry_type == CT_CLASS )
473 {
474 WeaponParticlesOnOverheating WPOF = new WeaponParticlesOnOverheating(this, config_OnOverheating_entry);
475 WPOOH_array.Insert(WPOF);
476 }
477 }
478
479
480 m_OnOverheatingEffect.Insert(id, WPOOH_array);
481 }
482 }

484
485 float GetOverheatingValue()
486 {
487 return m_OverheatingShots;
488 }
489
490 void IncreaseOverheating(ItemBase weapon, string ammoType, ItemBase muzzle_owner, ItemBase suppressor, string config_to_search)
491 {
492 if (m_MaxOverheatingValue > 0)
493 {
494 m_OverheatingShots++;
495
496 if (!m_CheckOverheating)
497 m_CheckOverheating = new Timer( CALL_CATEGORY_SYSTEM );
498
499 m_CheckOverheating.Stop();
500 m_CheckOverheating.Run(m_OverheatingDecayInterval, this, "OnOverheatingDecay");
501
502 CheckOverheating(weapon, ammoType, muzzle_owner, suppressor, config_to_search);
503 }
504 }
505
506 void CheckOverheating(ItemBase weapon = null, string ammoType = "", ItemBase muzzle_owner = null, ItemBase suppressor = null, string config_to_search = "")
507 {
508 if (m_OverheatingShots >= m_ShotsToStartOverheating && IsOverheatingEffectActive())
509 UpdateOverheating(weapon, ammoType, muzzle_owner, suppressor, config_to_search);
510
511 if (m_OverheatingShots >= m_ShotsToStartOverheating && !IsOverheatingEffectActive())
512 StartOverheating(weapon, ammoType, muzzle_owner, suppressor, config_to_search);
513
514 if (m_OverheatingShots < m_ShotsToStartOverheating && IsOverheatingEffectActive())
515 StopOverheating(weapon, ammoType, muzzle_owner, suppressor, config_to_search);
516
517 if (m_OverheatingShots > m_MaxOverheatingValue)
518 {
519 m_OverheatingShots = m_MaxOverheatingValue;
520 }
521 }
522
523 bool IsOverheatingEffectActive()
524 {
525 return m_IsOverheatingEffectActive;
526 }
527
528 void OnOverheatingDecay()
529 {
530 if (m_MaxOverheatingValue > 0)
531 m_OverheatingShots -= 1 + m_OverheatingShots / m_MaxOverheatingValue; // The hotter a barrel is, the faster it needs to cool down.
532 else
533 m_OverheatingShots--;
534
535 if (m_OverheatingShots <= 0)
536 {
537 m_CheckOverheating.Stop();
538 m_OverheatingShots = 0;
539 }
540 else
541 {
542 if (!m_CheckOverheating)
543 m_CheckOverheating = new Timer( CALL_CATEGORY_GAMEPLAY );
544
545 m_CheckOverheating.Stop();
546 m_CheckOverheating.Run(m_OverheatingDecayInterval, this, "OnOverheatingDecay");
547 }
548
549 CheckOverheating(this, "", this);
550 }
551
552 void StartOverheating(ItemBase weapon = null, string ammoType = "", ItemBase muzzle_owner = null, ItemBase suppressor = null, string config_to_search = "")
553 {
554 m_IsOverheatingEffectActive = true;
555 ItemBase.PlayOverheatingParticles(this, ammoType, this, suppressor, "CfgWeapons" );
556 }
557
558 void UpdateOverheating(ItemBase weapon = null, string ammoType = "", ItemBase muzzle_owner = null, ItemBase suppressor = null, string config_to_search = "")
559 {
560 KillAllOverheatingParticles();
561 ItemBase.UpdateOverheatingParticles(this, ammoType, this, suppressor, "CfgWeapons" );
562 UpdateAllOverheatingParticles();
563 }
564
565 void StopOverheating(ItemBase weapon = null, string ammoType = "", ItemBase muzzle_owner = null, ItemBase suppressor = null, string config_to_search = "")
566 {
567 m_IsOverheatingEffectActive = false;
568 ItemBase.StopOverheatingParticles(weapon, ammoType, muzzle_owner, suppressor, config_to_search);
569 }
570
571 void RegisterOverheatingParticle(Particle p, float min_heat_coef, float max_heat_coef, int particle_id, Object parent, vector local_pos, vector local_ori)
572 {
573 if (!m_OverheatingParticles)
574 m_OverheatingParticles = new array<ref OverheatingParticle>;
575
576 OverheatingParticle OP = new OverheatingParticle();
577 OP.RegisterParticle(p);
578 OP.SetOverheatingLimitMin(min_heat_coef);
579 OP.SetOverheatingLimitMax(max_heat_coef);
580 OP.SetParticleParams(particle_id, parent, local_pos, local_ori);
581
582 m_OverheatingParticles.Insert(OP);
583 }
584
585 float GetOverheatingCoef()
586 {
587 if (m_MaxOverheatingValue > 0)
588 return (m_OverheatingShots - m_ShotsToStartOverheating) / m_MaxOverheatingValue;
589
590 return -1;
591 }
592
593 void UpdateAllOverheatingParticles()
594 {
595 if (m_OverheatingParticles)
596 {
597 float overheat_coef = GetOverheatingCoef();
598 int count = m_OverheatingParticles.Count();
599
600 for (int i = count; i > 0; --i)
601 {
602 int id = i - 1;
603 OverheatingParticle OP = m_OverheatingParticles.Get(id);
604 Particle p = OP.GetParticle();
605
606 float overheat_min = OP.GetOverheatingLimitMin();
607 float overheat_max = OP.GetOverheatingLimitMax();
608
609 if (overheat_coef < overheat_min && overheat_coef >= overheat_max)
610 {
611 if (p)
612 {
613 p.Stop();
614 OP.RegisterParticle(null);
615 }
616 }
617 }
618 }
619 }
620
621 void KillAllOverheatingParticles()
622 {
623 if (m_OverheatingParticles)
624 {
625 for (int i = m_OverheatingParticles.Count(); i > 0; i--)
626 {
627 int id = i - 1;
628 OverheatingParticle OP = m_OverheatingParticles.Get(id);
629
630 if (OP)
631 {
632 Particle p = OP.GetParticle();
633
634 if (p)
635 {
636 p.Stop();
637 }
638
639 delete OP;
640 }
641 }
642
643 m_OverheatingParticles.Clear();
644 delete m_OverheatingParticles;
645 }
646 }

666 bool HasMuzzle()
667 {
668 if (IsInherited(Weapon) || IsInherited(SuppressorBase))
669 return true;
670
671 return false;
672 }
673
675 int GetMuzzleID()
676 {
677 if (!m_WeaponTypeToID)
678 m_WeaponTypeToID = new map<string, int>;
679
680 if ( m_WeaponTypeToID.Contains( GetType() ) )
681 {
682 return m_WeaponTypeToID.Get( GetType() );
683 }
684 else
685 {
686 // Register new weapon ID
687 m_WeaponTypeToID.Insert(GetType(), ++m_LastRegisteredWeaponID);
688 }
689
690 return m_LastRegisteredWeaponID;
691 }

703 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
704 void ~ItemBase()
705 {
706 if ( GetGame() && GetGame().GetPlayer() && ( !GetGame().IsDedicatedServer() ) )
707 {
708 PlayerBase player = PlayerBase.Cast( GetGame().GetPlayer() );
709 int r_index = player.GetHumanInventory().FindUserReservedLocationIndex(this);
710
711 if (r_index >= 0)
712 {
713 InventoryLocation r_il = new InventoryLocation;
714 player.GetHumanInventory().GetUserReservedLocation(r_index,r_il);
715
716 player.GetHumanInventory().ClearUserReservedLocationAtIndex(r_index);
717 int r_type = r_il.GetType();
718 if ( r_type == InventoryLocationType.CARGO || r_type == InventoryLocationType.PROXYCARGO )
719 {
720 r_il.GetParent().GetOnReleaseLock().Invoke( this );
721 }
722 else if ( r_type == InventoryLocationType.ATTACHMENT )
723 {
724 r_il.GetParent().GetOnAttachmentReleaseLock().Invoke( this, r_il.GetSlot() );
725 }
726
727 }
728
729 player.GetHumanInventory().ClearUserReservedLocation( this );
730 }
731
732 SEffectManager.DestroyEffect( m_LockingSound );
733 }

787 override void CombineItemsClient(EntityAI entity2, bool use_stack_max = true )
788 {
789 /*
790 ref Param1<EntityAI> item = new Param1<EntityAI>(entity2);
791 RPCSingleParam( ERPCs.RPC_ITEM_COMBINE, item, GetGame().GetPlayer() );
792 */
793 ItemBase item2 = ItemBase.Cast(entity2);
794
795 if ( GetGame().IsClient() )
796 {
797 if (ScriptInputUserData.CanStoreInputUserData())
798 {
799 ScriptInputUserData ctx = new ScriptInputUserData;
800 ctx.Write(INPUT_UDT_ITEM_MANIPULATION);
801 ctx.Write(-1);
802 ItemBase i1 = this; // @NOTE: workaround for correct serialization
803 ctx.Write(i1);
804 ctx.Write(item2);
805 ctx.Write(use_stack_max);
806 ctx.Write(-1);
807 ctx.Send();
808
809 if ( IsCombineAll(item2, use_stack_max) )
810 {
811 GetGame().GetPlayer().GetInventory().AddInventoryReservationEx(item2,null,GameInventory.c_InventoryReservationTimeoutShortMS);
812 }
813 }
814 }
815 else if ( !GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
816 {
817 CombineItems(item2, use_stack_max);
818 }
819 }

959 override void EEItemLocationChanged(notnull InventoryLocation oldLoc, notnull InventoryLocation newLoc)
960 {
961 super.EEItemLocationChanged(oldLoc,newLoc);
962
963 PlayerBase new_player = null;
964 PlayerBase old_player = null;
965
966 if ( newLoc.GetParent() )
967 new_player = PlayerBase.Cast(newLoc.GetParent().GetHierarchyRootPlayer());
968
969 if ( oldLoc.GetParent() )
970 old_player = PlayerBase.Cast(oldLoc.GetParent().GetHierarchyRootPlayer());
971
972 /*if ( old_player )
973 old_player.UpdateQuickBarEntityVisibility(this);*/
974
975 /*if ( old_player != new_player )
976 {
977 if ( old_player )
978 old_player.SetEnableQuickBarEntityShortcut(this, false);
979
980 if ( new_player )
981 new_player.SetEnableQuickBarEntityShortcut(this, true);
982 }*/
983
984 if (old_player && oldLoc.GetType() == InventoryLocationType.HANDS)
985 {
986 int r_index = old_player.GetHumanInventory().FindUserReservedLocationIndex(this);
987
988 if (r_index >= 0)
989 {
990 InventoryLocation r_il = new InventoryLocation;
991 old_player.GetHumanInventory().GetUserReservedLocation(r_index,r_il);
992
993 old_player.GetHumanInventory().ClearUserReservedLocationAtIndex(r_index);
994 int r_type = r_il.GetType();
995 if ( r_type == InventoryLocationType.CARGO || r_type == InventoryLocationType.PROXYCARGO )
996 {
997 r_il.GetParent().GetOnReleaseLock().Invoke( this );
998 }
999 else if ( r_type == InventoryLocationType.ATTACHMENT )
1000 {
1001 r_il.GetParent().GetOnAttachmentReleaseLock().Invoke( this, r_il.GetSlot() );
1002 }
1003
1004 }
1005 //old_player.GetHumanInventory().ClearUserReservedLocation(this);
1006 //GetOnReleaseLock().Invoke(this);
1007 }
1008
1009 if (newLoc.GetType() == InventoryLocationType.HANDS)
1010 {
1011 if (new_player)
1012 new_player.ForceStandUpForHeavyItems(newLoc.GetItem());
1013
1014 if (new_player == old_player)
1015 {
1016
1017 if ( oldLoc.GetParent() && !(oldLoc.GetParent() != new_player && oldLoc.GetType() == InventoryLocationType.ATTACHMENT) && new_player.GetHumanInventory().LocationGetEntity(oldLoc) == NULL )
1018 {
1019 if ( oldLoc.GetType() == InventoryLocationType.CARGO)
1020 {
1021 if ( oldLoc.GetParent().GetInventory().TestAddEntityInCargoExLoc(oldLoc, false, false, false, true, false, false) )
1022 {
1023 new_player.GetHumanInventory().SetUserReservedLocation(this,oldLoc);
1024 }
1025 }
1026 }
1027
1028 if ( new_player.GetHumanInventory().FindUserReservedLocationIndex( this ) >= 0 )
1029 {
1030 int type = oldLoc.GetType();
1031 if ( type == InventoryLocationType.CARGO || type == InventoryLocationType.PROXYCARGO )
1032 {
1033 oldLoc.GetParent().GetOnSetLock().Invoke( this );
1034 }
1035 else if ( type == InventoryLocationType.ATTACHMENT )
1036 {
1037 oldLoc.GetParent().GetOnAttachmentSetLock().Invoke( this, oldLoc.GetSlot() );
1038 }
1039 }
1040 if (!m_OldLocation)
1041 {
1042 m_OldLocation = new InventoryLocation;
1043 }
1044 m_OldLocation.Copy(oldLoc);
1045 }
1046 else
1047 {
1048 if (m_OldLocation)
1049 {
1050 m_OldLocation.Reset();
1051 }
1052 }
1053
1054 GetGame().GetAnalyticsClient().OnItemAttachedAtPlayer(this,"Hands");
1055 }
1056 else
1057 {
1058 if (new_player)
1059 {
1060 int res_index = new_player.GetHumanInventory().FindCollidingUserReservedLocationIndex(this, newLoc );
1061 if (res_index >= 0)
1062 {
1063 InventoryLocation il = new InventoryLocation;
1064 new_player.GetHumanInventory().GetUserReservedLocation(res_index,il);
1065 ItemBase it = ItemBase.Cast(il.GetItem());
1066 new_player.GetHumanInventory().ClearUserReservedLocationAtIndex(res_index);
1067 int rel_type = il.GetType();
1068 if ( rel_type == InventoryLocationType.CARGO || rel_type == InventoryLocationType.PROXYCARGO )
1069 {
1070 il.GetParent().GetOnReleaseLock().Invoke( it );
1071 }
1072 else if ( rel_type == InventoryLocationType.ATTACHMENT )
1073 {
1074 il.GetParent().GetOnAttachmentReleaseLock().Invoke( it, il.GetSlot() );
1075 }
1076 //it.GetOnReleaseLock().Invoke(it);
1077 }
1078 }
1079 else if (old_player && newLoc.GetType() == InventoryLocationType.GROUND && m_ThrowItemOnDrop)
1080 {
1081 //Print("---ThrowPhysically---");
1082 //ThrowPhysically(old_player, vector.Zero);
1083 m_ThrowItemOnDrop = false;
1084 }
1085
1086 if (m_OldLocation)
1087 {
1088 m_OldLocation.Reset();
1089 }
1090 }
1091 }

1166 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
1167 override void OnItemLocationChanged(EntityAI old_owner, EntityAI new_owner)
1168 {
1169 super.OnItemLocationChanged(old_owner, new_owner);
1170
1171 Man owner_player_old = NULL;
1172 Man owner_player_new = NULL;
1173
1174 if (old_owner)
1175 {
1176 if (old_owner.IsMan())
1177 {
1178 owner_player_old = Man.Cast( old_owner );
1179 }
1180 else
1181 {
1182 owner_player_old = Man.Cast( old_owner.GetHierarchyRootPlayer() );
1183 }
1184 }
1185
1186 if (new_owner)
1187 {
1188 if ( new_owner.IsMan() )
1189 {
1190 owner_player_new = Man.Cast( new_owner );
1191 }
1192 else
1193 {
1194 owner_player_new = Man.Cast( new_owner.GetHierarchyRootPlayer() );
1195 }
1196 }
1197
1198 if ( owner_player_old != owner_player_new )
1199 {
1200 if ( owner_player_old )
1201 {
1202 array<EntityAI> subItemsExit = new array<EntityAI>;
1203 GetInventory().EnumerateInventory(InventoryTraversalType.PREORDER,subItemsExit);
1204 for (int i = 0; i < subItemsExit.Count(); i++)
1205 {
1206 ItemBase item_exit = ItemBase.Cast(subItemsExit.Get(i));
1207 item_exit.OnInventoryExit(owner_player_old);
1208 }
1209 }
1210
1211 if ( owner_player_new )
1212 {
1213 array<EntityAI> subItemsEnter = new array<EntityAI>;
1214 GetInventory().EnumerateInventory(InventoryTraversalType.PREORDER,subItemsEnter);
1215 for (int j = 0; j < subItemsEnter.Count(); j++)
1216 {
1217 ItemBase item_enter = ItemBase.Cast(subItemsEnter.Get(j));
1218 item_enter.OnInventoryEnter(owner_player_new);
1219 }
1220 }
1221 }
1222 }

1313 override string ChangeIntoOnAttach(string slot)
1314 {
1315 int idx;
1316 TStringArray inventory_slots = new TStringArray;
1317 TStringArray attach_types = new TStringArray;
1318
1319 ConfigGetTextArray("ChangeInventorySlot",inventory_slots);
1320 if (inventory_slots.Count() < 1) //is string
1321 {
1322 inventory_slots.Insert(ConfigGetString("ChangeInventorySlot"));
1323 attach_types.Insert(ConfigGetString("ChangeIntoOnAttach"));
1324 }
1325 else //is array
1326 {
1327 ConfigGetTextArray("ChangeIntoOnAttach",attach_types);
1328 }
1329
1330 idx = inventory_slots.Find(slot);
1331 if (idx < 0)
1332 return "";
1333
1334 return attach_types.Get(idx);
1335 }
1336
1337 override string ChangeIntoOnDetach()
1338 {
1339 int idx = -1;
1340 string slot;
1341
1342 TStringArray inventory_slots = new TStringArray;
1343 TStringArray detach_types = new TStringArray;
1344
1345 this.ConfigGetTextArray("ChangeInventorySlot",inventory_slots);
1346 if (inventory_slots.Count() < 1) //is string
1347 {
1348 inventory_slots.Insert(this.ConfigGetString("ChangeInventorySlot"));
1349 detach_types.Insert(this.ConfigGetString("ChangeIntoOnDetach"));
1350 }
1351 else //is array
1352 {
1353 this.ConfigGetTextArray("ChangeIntoOnDetach",detach_types);
1354 if (detach_types.Count() < 1)
1355 detach_types.Insert(this.ConfigGetString("ChangeIntoOnDetach"));
1356 }
1357
1358 for (int i = 0; i < inventory_slots.Count(); i++)
1359 {
1360 slot = inventory_slots.Get(i);
1361 }
1362
1363 if (slot != "")
1364 {
1365 if (detach_types.Count() == 1)
1366 idx = 0;
1367 else
1368 idx = inventory_slots.Find(slot);
1369 }
1370 if (idx < 0)
1371 return "";
1372
1373 return detach_types.Get(idx);
1374 }
1375
1376 void ExplodeAmmo()
1377 {
1378 //timer
1379 ref Timer explode_timer = new Timer( CALL_CATEGORY_SYSTEM );
1380
1381 //min/max time
1382 float min_time = 1;
1383 float max_time = 3;
1384 float delay = Math.RandomFloat( min_time, max_time );
1385
1386 explode_timer.Run( delay, this, "DoAmmoExplosion" );
1387 }
1388
1389 void DoAmmoExplosion()
1390 {
1391 Magazine magazine = Magazine.Cast( this );
1392 int pop_sounds_count = 6;
1393 string pop_sounds[ 6 ] = { "ammopops_1","ammopops_2","ammopops_3","ammopops_4","ammopops_5","ammopops_6" };
1394
1395 //play sound
1396 int sound_idx = Math.RandomInt( 0, pop_sounds_count - 1 );
1397 string sound_name = pop_sounds[ sound_idx ];
1398 GetGame().CreateSoundOnObject( this, sound_name, 20, false );
1399
1400 //remove ammo count
1401 magazine.ServerAddAmmoCount( -1 );
1402
1403 //if condition then repeat -> ExplodeAmmo
1404 float min_temp_to_explode = 100; //min temperature for item to explode
1405
1406 if ( magazine.GetAmmoCount() > 0 && GetTemperature() >= min_temp_to_explode ) //TODO ? add check for parent -> fireplace
1407 {
1408 ExplodeAmmo();
1409 }
1410 }

1412 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1413 override void EEHitBy(TotalDamageResult damageResult, int damageType, EntityAI source, int component, string dmgZone, string ammo, vector modelPos, float speedCoef)
1414 {
1415 super.EEHitBy(damageResult, damageType, source, component, dmgZone, ammo, modelPos, speedCoef);
1416
1417 const int CHANCE_DAMAGE_CARGO = 4;
1418 const int CHANCE_DAMAGE_ATTACHMENT = 1;
1419 const int CHANCE_DAMAGE_NOTHING = 2;
1420
1421 if ( IsClothing() || IsContainer() || IsItemTent() )
1422 {
1423 float dmg = damageResult.GetDamage("","Health") * -0.5;
1424 int chances;
1425 int rnd;
1426
1427 if (GetInventory().GetCargo())
1428 {
1429 chances = CHANCE_DAMAGE_CARGO + CHANCE_DAMAGE_ATTACHMENT + CHANCE_DAMAGE_NOTHING;
1430 rnd = Math.RandomInt(0,chances);
1431
1432 if (rnd < CHANCE_DAMAGE_CARGO)
1433 {
1434 DamageItemInCargo(dmg);
1435 }
1436 else if (rnd < (chances - CHANCE_DAMAGE_NOTHING) )
1437 {
1438 DamageItemAttachments(dmg);
1439 }
1440 }
1441 else
1442 {
1443 chances = CHANCE_DAMAGE_ATTACHMENT + CHANCE_DAMAGE_NOTHING;
1444 rnd = Math.RandomInt(0,chances);
1445
1446 if (rnd < CHANCE_DAMAGE_ATTACHMENT)
1447 {
1448 DamageItemAttachments(dmg);
1449 }
1450 }
1451 }
1452 }
1453
1454 bool DamageItemInCargo(float damage)
1455 {
1456 if ( GetInventory().GetCargo() )
1457 {
1458 int item_count = GetInventory().GetCargo().GetItemCount();
1459 if ( item_count > 0 )
1460 {
1461 int random_pick = Math.RandomInt(0, item_count);
1462 ItemBase item = ItemBase.Cast( GetInventory().GetCargo().GetItem(random_pick) );
1463 if (!item.IsExplosive())
1464 {
1465 item.AddHealth("","",damage);
1466 return true;
1467 }
1468 }
1469 }
1470 return false;
1471 }
1472
1473 bool DamageItemAttachments(float damage)
1474 {
1475 int attachment_count = GetInventory().AttachmentCount();
1476 if ( attachment_count > 0 )
1477 {
1478 int random_pick = Math.RandomInt(0, attachment_count);
1479 ItemBase attachment = ItemBase.Cast( GetInventory().GetAttachmentFromIndex(random_pick));
1480 if (!attachment.IsExplosive())
1481 {
1482 attachment.AddHealth("","",damage);
1483 return true;
1484 }
1485 }
1486 return false;
1487 }

1497
1498 void SplitIntoStackMaxClient( EntityAI destination_entity, int slot_id )
1499 {
1500 if( GetGame().IsClient() )
1501 {
1502 if (ScriptInputUserData.CanStoreInputUserData())
1503 {
1504 ScriptInputUserData ctx = new ScriptInputUserData;
1505 ctx.Write(INPUT_UDT_ITEM_MANIPULATION);
1506 ctx.Write(1);
1507 ItemBase i1 = this; // @NOTE: workaround for correct serialization
1508 ctx.Write(i1);
1509 ctx.Write(destination_entity);
1510 ctx.Write(true);
1511 ctx.Write(slot_id);
1512 ctx.Send();
1513 }
1514 }
1515 else if( !GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
1516 {
1517 SplitIntoStackMax( destination_entity, slot_id, PlayerBase.Cast( GetGame().GetPlayer() ) );
1518 }
1519 }
1520
1521 void SplitIntoStackMax( EntityAI destination_entity, int slot_id, PlayerBase player )
1522 {
1523 float split_quantity_new;
1524 ref ItemBase new_item;
1525 float quantity = GetQuantity();
1526 float stack_max = GetTargetQuantityMax(slot_id);
1527 InventoryLocation loc = new InventoryLocation;
1528
1529 if ( destination_entity && slot_id != -1 && InventorySlots.IsSlotIdValid( slot_id ) )
1530 {
1531 if ( stack_max <= GetQuantity() )
1532 split_quantity_new = stack_max;
1533 else
1534 split_quantity_new = GetQuantity();
1535
1536 new_item = ItemBase.Cast( destination_entity.GetInventory().CreateAttachmentEx( this.GetType(), slot_id ) );
1537 if ( new_item )
1538 {
1539 new_item.SetResultOfSplit(true);
1540 MiscGameplayFunctions.TransferItemProperties( this, new_item );
1541 AddQuantity( -split_quantity_new );
1542 new_item.SetQuantity( split_quantity_new );
1543 }
1544 }
1545 else if ( destination_entity && slot_id == -1 )
1546 {
1547 if ( quantity > stack_max )
1548 split_quantity_new = stack_max;
1549 else
1550 split_quantity_new = quantity;
1551
1552 if (destination_entity.GetInventory().FindFreeLocationFor( this, FindInventoryLocationType.ANY, loc ))
1553 {
1554 Object o = destination_entity.GetInventory().LocationCreateEntity( loc, GetType(), ECE_IN_INVENTORY, RF_DEFAULT );
1555 new_item = ItemBase.Cast( o );
1556 }
1557
1558 if ( new_item )
1559 {
1560 new_item.SetResultOfSplit(true);
1561 MiscGameplayFunctions.TransferItemProperties( this, new_item );
1562 AddQuantity( -split_quantity_new );
1563 new_item.SetQuantity( split_quantity_new );
1564 }
1565 }
1566 else
1567 {
1568 if ( stack_max != 0 )
1569 {
1570 if ( stack_max < GetQuantity() )
1571 {
1572 split_quantity_new = GetQuantity() - stack_max;
1573 }
1574
1575 if ( split_quantity_new == 0 )
1576 {
1577 if ( !GetGame().IsMultiplayer() )
1578 player.PhysicalPredictiveDropItem( this );
1579 else
1580 player.ServerDropEntity( this );
1581 return;
1582 }
1583
1584 new_item = ItemBase.Cast( GetGame().CreateObjectEx( GetType(), player.GetWorldPosition(), ECE_PLACE_ON_SURFACE ) );
1585
1586 if ( new_item )
1587 {
1588 new_item.SetResultOfSplit(true);
1589 MiscGameplayFunctions.TransferItemProperties( this, new_item );
1590 SetQuantity( split_quantity_new );
1591 new_item.SetQuantity( stack_max );
1592 new_item.PlaceOnSurface();
1593 }
1594 }
1595 }
1596 }

1752
1753 void SplitItemToInventoryLocation( notnull InventoryLocation dst )
1754 {
1755 if ( !CanBeSplit() )
1756 return;
1757
1758 float quantity = GetQuantity();
1759 float split_quantity_new = Math.Floor( quantity * 0.5 );
1760
1761 ItemBase new_item = ItemBase.Cast( GameInventory.LocationCreateEntity( dst, GetType(), ECE_IN_INVENTORY, RF_DEFAULT ) );
1762
1763 if ( new_item )
1764 {
1765 if (new_item.GetQuantityMax() < split_quantity_new)
1766 {
1767 split_quantity_new = new_item.GetQuantityMax();
1768 }
1769
1770 new_item.SetResultOfSplit(true);
1771 MiscGameplayFunctions.TransferItemProperties(this, new_item);
1772
1773 if (dst.IsValid() && dst.GetType() == InventoryLocationType.ATTACHMENT && split_quantity_new > 1)
1774 {
1775 AddQuantity(-1);
1776 new_item.SetQuantity(1);
1777 }
1778 else
1779 {
1780 AddQuantity(-split_quantity_new);
1781 new_item.SetQuantity( split_quantity_new );
1782 }
1783 }
1784 }
1785
1786 void SplitItem( PlayerBase player )
1787 {
1788 if ( !CanBeSplit() )
1789 {
1790 return;
1791 }
1792
1793 float quantity = GetQuantity();
1794 float split_quantity_new = Math.Floor(quantity / 2);
1795
1796 InventoryLocation invloc = new InventoryLocation;
1797 bool found = player.GetInventory().FindFirstFreeLocationForNewEntity(GetType(), FindInventoryLocationType.ATTACHMENT, invloc);
1798
1799 ItemBase new_item;
1800 new_item = player.CreateCopyOfItemInInventoryOrGroundEx(this, true);
1801
1802 if (new_item)
1803 {
1804 if (new_item.GetQuantityMax() < split_quantity_new)
1805 {
1806 split_quantity_new = new_item.GetQuantityMax();
1807 }
1808 if (found && invloc.IsValid() && invloc.GetType() == InventoryLocationType.ATTACHMENT && split_quantity_new > 1)
1809 {
1810 AddQuantity(-1);
1811 new_item.SetQuantity(1);
1812 }
1813 else
1814 {
1815 AddQuantity(-split_quantity_new);
1816 new_item.SetQuantity( split_quantity_new );
1817 }
1818 }
1819 }
1820
1822 void OnQuantityChanged(float delta)
1823 {
1824 ItemBase parent = ItemBase.Cast( GetHierarchyParent() );
1825
1826 if (parent)
1827 {
1828 parent.OnAttachmentQuantityChangedEx(this, delta);
1829 }
1830
1831 if (m_CanThisBeSplit && delta > 0 && GetUnitWeight(false) != -1)
1832 {
1833 UpdateWeight(WeightUpdateType.RECURSIVE_ADD, GetUnitWeight(false) * delta);
1834 }
1835 else if (m_CanThisBeSplit && delta < 0 && GetUnitWeight(false) != -1)
1836 {
1837 UpdateWeight(WeightUpdateType.RECURSIVE_REMOVE, -GetUnitWeight(false) * delta);
1838 }
1839 else
1840 {
1841 UpdateWeight();
1842 }
1843 }

1847 {
1848 // insert code here
1849 }

1853 {
1854 OnAttachmentQuantityChanged(item);
1855 }

1857 override void EEHealthLevelChanged(int oldLevel, int newLevel, string zone)
1858 {
1859 super.EEHealthLevelChanged(oldLevel,newLevel,zone);
1860
1861 if (GetGame().IsServer())
1862 {
1863 if (newLevel == GameConstants.STATE_RUINED)
1864 {
1866 EntityAI parent = GetHierarchyParent();
1867 if (parent && parent.IsFireplace())
1868 {
1869 CargoBase cargo = GetInventory().GetCargo();
1870 if (cargo)
1871 {
1872 for (int i = 0; i < cargo.GetItemCount(); ++i)
1873 {
1874 parent.GetInventory().TakeEntityToInventory(InventoryMode.SERVER, FindInventoryLocationType.CARGO, cargo.GetItem(i));
1875 }
1876 }
1877 }
1878 }
1879
1880 if (IsResultOfSplit())
1881 {
1882 // reset the splitting result flag, return to normal item behavior
1883 SetResultOfSplit(false);
1884 return;
1885 }
1886
1887 if (m_Cleanness != 0 && oldLevel < newLevel && newLevel != 0)
1888 {
1889 SetCleanness(0);//unclean the item upon damage dealt
1890 }
1891 }
1892 }

1956
1957 override bool CanBeCombined( EntityAI other_item, bool reservation_check = true, bool stack_max_limit = false )
1958 {
1959 //Print("CanBeCombined - " + this + ": " + GetQuantity() + " + " + other_item + ": " + other_item.GetQuantity());
1960 //TODO: delete check zero quantity check after fix double posts hands fsm events
1961 if ( !other_item || GetType() != other_item.GetType() || (IsFullQuantity() && other_item.GetQuantity() > 0) || other_item == this)
1962 return false;
1963
1964 if ( GetHealthLevel() == GameConstants.STATE_RUINED || other_item.GetHealthLevel() == GameConstants.STATE_RUINED )
1965 return false;
1966
1967 //can_this_be_combined = ConfigGetBool("canBeSplit");
1968 if ( !can_this_be_combined )
1969 return false;
1970
1971
1972 Magazine mag = Magazine.Cast(this);
1973 if (mag)
1974 {
1975 if ( mag.GetAmmoCount() >= mag.GetAmmoMax())
1976 return false;
1977
1978 if(stack_max_limit)
1979 {
1980 Magazine other_mag = Magazine.Cast(other_item);
1981 if(other_item)
1982 {
1983 if(mag.GetAmmoCount() + other_mag.GetAmmoCount() > mag.GetAmmoMax())
1984 return false;
1985 }
1986
1987 }
1988 }
1989 else
1990 {
1991 //TODO: delete check zero quantity check after fix double posts hands fsm events
1992 if ( GetQuantity() >= GetQuantityMax() && other_item.GetQuantity() > 0 )
1993 return false;
1994
1995 if (stack_max_limit && (GetQuantity() + other_item.GetQuantity() > GetQuantityMax()))
1996 return false;
1997 }
1998
1999 PlayerBase player = null;
2000 if ( CastTo( player, GetHierarchyRootPlayer() ) ) //false when attached to player's attachment slot
2001 {
2002 if ( player.GetInventory().HasAttachment( this ) )
2003 return false;
2004
2005 if ( player.IsItemsToDelete())
2006 return false;
2007 }
2008
2009 if ( reservation_check && (GetInventory().HasInventoryReservation( this, null ) || other_item.GetInventory().HasInventoryReservation( other_item, null )))
2010 return false;
2011
2012 int slotID;
2013 string slotName;
2014 if (GetInventory().GetCurrentAttachmentSlotInfo(slotID,slotName) && GetHierarchyParent().GetInventory().GetSlotLock(slotID))
2015 return false;
2016
2017 return true;
2018 }

2020 bool IsCombineAll( ItemBase other_item, bool use_stack_max = false )
2021 {
2022 return ComputeQuantityUsed( other_item, use_stack_max ) == other_item.GetQuantity();
2023 }

2034
2035 int ComputeQuantityUsed( ItemBase other_item, bool use_stack_max = true )
2036 {
2037 return ComputeQuantityUsedEx(other_item, use_stack_max);
2038 }
2039
2040 float ComputeQuantityUsedEx( ItemBase other_item, bool use_stack_max = true )
2041 {
2042 float other_item_quantity = other_item.GetQuantity();
2043 float this_free_space;
2044
2045 float stack_max = GetQuantityMax();
2046
2047 this_free_space = stack_max - GetQuantity();
2048
2049 if( other_item_quantity > this_free_space )
2050 {
2051 return this_free_space;
2052 }
2053 else
2054 {
2055 return other_item_quantity;
2056 }
2057 }
2058
2059 void CombineItems( ItemBase other_item, bool use_stack_max = true )
2060 {
2061 if( !CanBeCombined(other_item, false) )
2062 return;
2063
2064 if( !IsMagazine() && other_item )
2065 {
2066 float quantity_used = ComputeQuantityUsedEx(other_item,use_stack_max);
2067 if( quantity_used != 0 )
2068 {
2069 float hp1 = GetHealth01("","");
2070 float hp2 = other_item.GetHealth01("","");
2071 float hpResult = ((hp1*GetQuantity()) + (hp2*quantity_used));
2072 hpResult = hpResult / ( GetQuantity() + quantity_used );
2073
2074 hpResult *= GetMaxHealth();
2075 Math.Round( hpResult );
2076 SetHealth("", "Health", hpResult );
2077
2078 AddQuantity(quantity_used);
2079 other_item.AddQuantity(-quantity_used);
2080 }
2081 }
2082 OnCombine(other_item);
2083 }

2088

2092 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
2093 void GetRecipesActions( Man player, out TSelectableActionInfoArray outputList )
2094 {
2095 PlayerBase p = PlayerBase.Cast( player );
2096
2097 array<int> recipes_ids = p.m_Recipes;
2098 PluginRecipesManager module_recipes_manager = PluginRecipesManager.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginRecipesManager) );
2099 if( module_recipes_manager )
2100 {
2101 EntityAI item_in_hands = player.GetHumanInventory().GetEntityInHands();
2102 module_recipes_manager.GetValidRecipes( ItemBase.Cast( this ), ItemBase.Cast( item_in_hands ),recipes_ids, PlayerBase.Cast( player ) );
2103 }
2104 for(int i = 0;i < recipes_ids.Count();i++)
2105 {
2106 int key = recipes_ids.Get(i);
2107 string recipe_name = module_recipes_manager.GetRecipeName(key);
2108 outputList.Insert( new TSelectableActionInfo( SAT_CRAFTING, key, recipe_name ) );
2109 }
2110 }

2199 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
2200 bool OnAction(int action_id, Man player, ParamsReadContext ctx)
2201 {
2202 if (action_id >= EActions.RECIPES_RANGE_START && action_id < EActions.RECIPES_RANGE_END)
2203 {
2204 PluginRecipesManager plugin_recipes_manager = PluginRecipesManager.Cast( GetPlugin(PluginRecipesManager) );
2205 int idWithoutOffset = action_id - EActions.RECIPES_RANGE_START;
2206 PlayerBase p = PlayerBase.Cast( player );

2601
2602 // Checks if item is of questioned kind
2603 override bool KindOf( string tag )
2604 {
2605 bool found = false;
2606 string item_name = this.GetType();
2607 ref TStringArray item_tag_array = new TStringArray;
2608 GetGame().ConfigGetTextArray("cfgVehicles " + item_name + " itemInfo", item_tag_array);
2609
2610 int array_size = item_tag_array.Count();
2611 for (int i = 0; i < array_size; i++)
2612 {
2613 if ( item_tag_array.Get(i) == tag )
2614 {
2615 found = true;
2616 break;
2617 }
2618 }
2619 return found;
2620 }

2622
2623 override void OnRPC( PlayerIdentity sender, int rpc_type,ParamsReadContext ctx )
2624 {
2625 //Debug.Log("OnRPC called");
2626 super.OnRPC( sender, rpc_type,ctx );
2627
2628 //Play soundset for attachment locking ( ActionLockAttachment.c )
2629 switch ( rpc_type )
2630 {
2631 #ifndef SERVER
2632 case ERPCs.RPC_SOUND_LOCK_ATTACH:
2633 Param2<bool, string> p = new Param2<bool, string>(false, "");
2634
2635 if ( !ctx.Read( p ) )
2636 return;
2637
2638 bool play = p.param1;
2639 string soundSet = p.param2;
2640
2641 if ( play )
2642 {
2643 if ( m_LockingSound )
2644 {
2645 if ( !m_LockingSound.IsSoundPlaying() )
2646 {
2647 m_LockingSound = SEffectManager.PlaySound( soundSet, GetPosition(), 0, 0, true );
2648 }
2649 }
2650 else
2651 {
2652 m_LockingSound = SEffectManager.PlaySound( soundSet, GetPosition(), 0, 0, true );
2653 }
2654 }
2655 else
2656 {
2657 SEffectManager.DestroyEffect( m_LockingSound );
2658 }
2659
2660 break;
2661 #endif
2662
2663 }
2664
2665 if ( GetWrittenNoteData() )
2666 {
2667 GetWrittenNoteData().OnRPC( sender, rpc_type,ctx );
2668 }
2669 }

2725
2726 void SerializeNumericalVars(array<float> floats_out)
2727 {
2728 // the order of serialization must be the same as the order of de-serialization
2729 floats_out.Insert(m_VariablesMask);
2730 //--------------------------------------------
2731 if( IsVariableSet(VARIABLE_QUANTITY) )
2732 {
2733 floats_out.Insert(m_VarQuantity);
2734 }
2735 //--------------------------------------------
2736 if( IsVariableSet(VARIABLE_TEMPERATURE) )
2737 {
2738 floats_out.Insert(m_VarTemperature);
2739 }
2740 //--------------------------------------------
2741 if( IsVariableSet(VARIABLE_WET) )
2742 {
2743 floats_out.Insert(m_VarWet);
2744 }
2745 //--------------------------------------------
2746 if( IsVariableSet(VARIABLE_LIQUIDTYPE) )
2747 {
2748 floats_out.Insert(m_VarLiquidType);
2749 }
2750 //--------------------------------------------
2751 if( IsVariableSet(VARIABLE_COLOR) )
2752 {
2753 floats_out.Insert(m_ColorComponentR);
2754 floats_out.Insert(m_ColorComponentG);
2755 floats_out.Insert(m_ColorComponentB);
2756 floats_out.Insert(m_ColorComponentA);
2757 }
2758 //--------------------------------------------
2759 if( IsVariableSet(VARIABLE_CLEANNESS) )
2760 {
2761 floats_out.Insert(m_Cleanness);
2762 }
2763 //--------------------------------------------
2764 }
2765
2766 void DeSerializeNumericalVars(array<float> floats)
2767 {
2768 // the order of serialization must be the same as the order of de-serialization
2769 int index = 0;
2770 int mask = Math.Round(floats.Get(index));
2771
2772 index++;
2773 //--------------------------------------------
2774 if( mask & VARIABLE_QUANTITY )
2775 {
2776 if ( m_IsStoreLoad )
2777 {
2778 m_StoreLoadedQuantity = floats.Get(index);
2779 }
2780 else
2781 {
2782 float quantity = floats.Get(index);
2783 SetQuantity(quantity, true, false, false, false );
2784 }
2785 index++;
2786 }
2787 //--------------------------------------------
2788 if( mask & VARIABLE_TEMPERATURE )
2789 {
2790 float temperature = floats.Get(index);
2791 SetTemperature(temperature);
2792 index++;
2793 }
2794 //--------------------------------------------
2795 if( mask & VARIABLE_WET )
2796 {
2797 float wet = floats.Get(index);
2798 SetWet(wet);
2799 index++;
2800 }
2801 //--------------------------------------------
2802 if( mask & VARIABLE_LIQUIDTYPE )
2803 {
2804 int liquidtype = Math.Round(floats.Get(index));
2805 SetLiquidType(liquidtype);
2806 index++;
2807 }
2808 //--------------------------------------------
2809 if( mask & VARIABLE_COLOR )
2810 {
2811 m_ColorComponentR = Math.Round(floats.Get(index));
2812 index++;
2813 m_ColorComponentG = Math.Round(floats.Get(index));
2814 index++;
2815 m_ColorComponentB = Math.Round(floats.Get(index));
2816 index++;
2817 m_ColorComponentA = Math.Round(floats.Get(index));
2818 index++;
2819 }
2820 if( mask & VARIABLE_CLEANNESS )
2821 {
2822 int cleanness = Math.Round(floats.Get(index));
2823 SetCleanness(cleanness);
2824 index++;
2825 }
2826 //--------------------------------------------
2827 }
2828
2829
2830 void WriteVarsToCTX(ParamsWriteContext ctx)
2831 {
2832 ctx.Write(m_VariablesMask);
2833
2834 //--------------------------------------------
2835 if( IsVariableSet(VARIABLE_QUANTITY) )
2836 {
2837 ctx.Write(m_VarQuantity);
2838 }
2839 //--------------------------------------------
2840 if( IsVariableSet(VARIABLE_TEMPERATURE) )
2841 {
2842 ctx.Write(m_VarTemperature);
2843 }
2844 //--------------------------------------------
2845 if( IsVariableSet(VARIABLE_WET) )
2846 {
2847 ctx.Write(m_VarWet);
2848 }
2849 //--------------------------------------------
2850 if( IsVariableSet(VARIABLE_LIQUIDTYPE) )
2851 {
2852 ctx.Write(m_VarLiquidType);
2853 }
2854 //--------------------------------------------
2855 if( IsVariableSet(VARIABLE_COLOR) )
2856 {
2857 ctx.Write(m_ColorComponentR);
2858 ctx.Write(m_ColorComponentG);
2859 ctx.Write(m_ColorComponentB);
2860 ctx.Write(m_ColorComponentA);
2861 }
2862 //--------------------------------------------
2863 if( IsVariableSet(VARIABLE_CLEANNESS) )
2864 {
2865 ctx.Write(m_Cleanness);
2866 }
2867 }
2868
2869 bool ReadVarsFromCTX(ParamsReadContext ctx, int version = -1)//with ID optimization
2870 {
2871 int numOfItems;
2872 int intValue;
2873 float value;
2874 if( version <= 108 && version!= -1 )
2875 {
2876 if(!ctx.Read(CachedObjectsParams.PARAM1_INT))
2877 return false;
2878
2879 numOfItems = CachedObjectsParams.PARAM1_INT.param1;
2880 CachedObjectsArrays.ARRAY_FLOAT.Clear();
2881
2882 for(int i = 0; i < numOfItems; i++)
2883 {
2884 if(!ctx.Read(CachedObjectsParams.PARAM1_FLOAT))
2885 return false;
2886 value = CachedObjectsParams.PARAM1_FLOAT.param1;
2887
2888 CachedObjectsArrays.ARRAY_FLOAT.Insert(value);
2889 }
2890
2891 DeSerializeNumericalVars(CachedObjectsArrays.ARRAY_FLOAT);
2892 return true;
2893 }
2894 else if( version <= 116 && version!= -1)
2895 {
2896 if(!ctx.Read(numOfItems))
2897 return false;
2898
2899 CachedObjectsArrays.ARRAY_FLOAT.Clear();
2900
2901 for(int j = 0; j < numOfItems; j++)
2902 {
2903 if(!ctx.Read(value))
2904 return false;
2905 CachedObjectsArrays.ARRAY_FLOAT.Insert(value);
2906 }
2907
2908 DeSerializeNumericalVars(CachedObjectsArrays.ARRAY_FLOAT);
2909 return true;
2910 }
2911 else
2912 {
2913 int mask;
2914 if ( !ctx.Read(mask) )
2915 return false;
2916
2917 if( mask & VARIABLE_QUANTITY )
2918 {
2919 if ( !ctx.Read(value) )
2920 return false;
2921
2922 if ( m_IsStoreLoad )
2923 {
2924 m_StoreLoadedQuantity = value;
2925 }
2926 else
2927 {
2928 SetQuantity(value, true, false, false, false );
2929 }
2930 }
2931 //--------------------------------------------
2932 if( mask & VARIABLE_TEMPERATURE )
2933 {
2934 if ( !ctx.Read(value) )
2935 return false;
2936 SetTemperature(value);
2937 }
2938 //--------------------------------------------
2939 if( mask & VARIABLE_WET )
2940 {
2941 if ( !ctx.Read(value) )
2942 return false;
2943 SetWet(value);
2944 }
2945 //--------------------------------------------
2946 if( mask & VARIABLE_LIQUIDTYPE )
2947 {
2948 if ( !ctx.Read(intValue) )
2949 return false;
2950 SetLiquidType(intValue);
2951 }
2952 //--------------------------------------------
2953 if( mask & VARIABLE_COLOR )
2954 {
2955 if ( !ctx.Read(intValue) )
2956 return false;
2957
2958 m_ColorComponentR = intValue;
2959 if ( !ctx.Read(value) )
2960 return false;
2961
2962 m_ColorComponentG = intValue;
2963 if ( !ctx.Read(value) )
2964 return false;
2965
2966 m_ColorComponentB = intValue;
2967 if ( !ctx.Read(value) )
2968 return false;
2969
2970 m_ColorComponentA = intValue;
2971 }
2972 //--------------------------------------------
2973 if( mask & VARIABLE_CLEANNESS )
2974 {
2975 if ( !ctx.Read(intValue) )
2976 return false;
2977 SetCleanness(intValue);
2978 }
2979 }
2980 return true;
2981 }
2982
2983 void SaveVariables(ParamsWriteContext ctx)
2984 {
2985 //Debug.Log("Saving Item Stage 0 "+ClassName(this)+" " + ToString(this));
2986
2987 //first set the flags
2988
2989 int varFlags = 0;
2990
2991 if ( m_VariablesMask )
2992 varFlags = ItemVariableFlags.FLOAT;
2993
2994 ctx.Write(varFlags);
2995 //-------------------
2996
2997 //now serialize the variables
2998
2999 //floats
3000 if ( m_VariablesMask )
3001 WriteVarsToCTX(ctx);
3002 }
3003
3004
3005 //----------------------------------------------------------------
3006 bool LoadVariables(ParamsReadContext ctx, int version = -1)
3007 {
3008 int varFlags;
3009 if( version <= 108 && version != -1 )
3010 {
3011 //read the flags
3012 if(!ctx.Read(CachedObjectsParams.PARAM1_INT))
3013 {
3014 return false;
3015 }
3016 else
3017 {
3018 varFlags = CachedObjectsParams.PARAM1_INT.param1;
3019 //--------------
3020 if( varFlags & ItemVariableFlags.FLOAT )
3021 {
3022 if(!ReadVarsFromCTX(ctx, version))
3023 return false;
3024 }
3025 }
3026 }
3027 else
3028 {
3029 //read the flags
3030 if(!ctx.Read(varFlags))
3031 {
3032 return false;
3033 }
3034 else
3035 {
3036 //--------------
3037 if( varFlags & ItemVariableFlags.FLOAT )
3038 {
3039 if(!ReadVarsFromCTX(ctx, version))
3040 return false;
3041 }
3042 }
3043 }
3044 return true;
3045 }
3046
3047
3048 //----------------------------------------------------------------
3049 override bool OnStoreLoad(ParamsReadContext ctx, int version)
3050 {
3051 m_IsStoreLoad = true;
3052
3053 if (GetDamageSystemVersionChange() != -1 && version < GetDamageSystemVersionChange())
3054 {
3055 m_FixDamageSystemInit = true;
3056 }
3057
3058 if ( !super.OnStoreLoad(ctx, version) )
3059 {
3060 m_IsStoreLoad = false;
3061 return false;
3062 }
3063
3064 if (version >= 114)
3065 {
3066 bool hasQuickBarIndexSaved;
3067
3068 if (!ctx.Read(hasQuickBarIndexSaved))
3069 {
3070 m_IsStoreLoad = false;
3071 return false;
3072 }
3073
3074 if (hasQuickBarIndexSaved)
3075 {
3076 int itmQBIndex;
3077
3078 //Load quickbar item bind
3079 if (!ctx.Read(itmQBIndex))
3080 {
3081 m_IsStoreLoad = false;
3082 return false;
3083 }
3084
3085 PlayerBase parentPlayer = PlayerBase.Cast(GetHierarchyRootPlayer());
3086 if ( itmQBIndex != -1 && parentPlayer )
3087 parentPlayer.SetLoadedQuickBarItemBind(this, itmQBIndex);
3088 }
3089 }
3090 else
3091 {
3092 // Backup of how it used to be
3093 PlayerBase player;
3094 int itemQBIndex;
3095 if (version == int.MAX)
3096 {
3097 if (!ctx.Read(itemQBIndex))
3098 {
3099 m_IsStoreLoad = false;
3100 return false;
3101 }
3102 }
3103 else if ( Class.CastTo(player, GetHierarchyRootPlayer()) )
3104 {
3105 //Load quickbar item bind
3106 if (!ctx.Read(itemQBIndex))
3107 {
3108 m_IsStoreLoad = false;
3109 return false;
3110 }
3111 if ( itemQBIndex != -1 && player )
3112 player.SetLoadedQuickBarItemBind(this,itemQBIndex);
3113 }
3114 }
3115
3116 // variable management system
3117 if ( !LoadVariables(ctx, version) )
3118 {
3119 m_IsStoreLoad = false;
3120 return false;
3121 }
3122
3123 //agent trasmission system
3124 if ( !LoadAgents(ctx, version) )
3125 {
3126 m_IsStoreLoad = false;
3127 return false;
3128 }
3129
3130 m_IsStoreLoad = false;
3131 return true;
3132 }

3141 {

3233 //------------------------- Quantity
3234 //----------------------------------------------------------------
3236 bool SetQuantity(float value, bool destroy_config = true, bool destroy_forced = false, bool allow_client = false, bool clamp_to_stack_max = true)
3237 {
3238 if ( !IsServerCheck(allow_client) )
3239 return false;
3240
3241 if ( !HasQuantity() )
3242 return false;
3243
3244 if ( IsLiquidContainer() && GetLiquidType() == 0 )
3245 {
3246 Debug.LogError("No LiquidType specified, try setting 'varLiquidTypeInit' to a particular liquid type");
3247 return false;
3248 }
3249
3250 float min = GetQuantityMin();
3251 float max = GetQuantityMax();
3252
3253 bool on_min_value = value <= (min + 0.001); //workaround, items with "varQuantityDestroyOnMin = true;" get destroyed
3254
3255 if ( on_min_value )
3256 {
3257 if ( destroy_config )
3258 {
3259 bool dstr = ConfigGetBool("varQuantityDestroyOnMin");
3260 if ( dstr )
3261 {
3262 m_VarQuantity = Math.Clamp(value, min, max);
3263 this.Delete();
3264 return true;
3265 }
3266 }
3267 else if ( destroy_forced )
3268 {
3269 m_VarQuantity = Math.Clamp(value, min, max);
3270 this.Delete();
3271 return true;
3272 }
3273 // we get here if destroy_config IS true AND dstr(config destroy param) IS false;
3274 RemoveAllAgents();//we remove all agents when we got to the min value, but the item is not getting deleted
3275 }
3276
3277 float delta = m_VarQuantity;
3278 m_VarQuantity = Math.Clamp(value, min, max);
3279
3280 if ( m_StoreLoadedQuantity == float.LOWEST )//any other value means we are setting quantity from storage
3281 {
3282 delta = m_VarQuantity - delta;
3283
3284 if (delta)
3285 {
3286 OnQuantityChanged(delta);
3287 }
3288 }
3289
3290 SetVariableMask(VARIABLE_QUANTITY);
3291
3292 return false;
3293 }

3310 {

3312 int result = Math.Round(Math.Lerp(GetQuantityMin(), GetQuantityMax(), value_clamped));
3313 SetQuantity(result, destroy_config, destroy_forced);
3314 }

3331 //----------------------------------------------------------------
3332 override int GetQuantityMax()
3333 {
3334 float max = 0;
3335
3336 InventoryLocation il = new InventoryLocation;
3337 if (GetInventory())
3338 GetInventory().GetCurrentInventoryLocation(il);
3339
3340 int slot = il.GetSlot();
3341
3342 if ( slot != -1 )
3343 max = InventorySlots.GetStackMaxForSlotId( slot );
3344
3345 if ( max <= 0 )
3346 max = m_VarStackMax;
3347
3348 if ( max <= 0 )
3349 max = m_VarQuantityMax;
3350
3351 return max;
3352 }

3355 {
3356 float quantity_max = 0;
3357

3359 quantity_max = InventorySlots.GetStackMaxForSlotId( attSlotID );
3360
3361 if ( quantity_max <= 0 )
3362 quantity_max = m_VarStackMax;
3363
3364 if ( quantity_max <= 0 )
3365 quantity_max = m_VarQuantityMax;
3366
3367 return quantity_max;
3368 }

3402 //Calculates weight of single item without attachments
3403 float GetSingleInventoryItemWeight()
3404 {
3405 float item_wetness = GetWet();
3406 float itemQuantity = 0;
3407 float Weight = 0;
3408 if (GetQuantity() != 0)
3409 {
3410 itemQuantity = GetQuantity();
3411 }
3412
3413 if ( m_CanThisBeSplit ) //quantity determines size of the stack
3414 {
3415 Weight = ((item_wetness + 1) * m_ConfigWeight * itemQuantity);
3416 }
3417 else if (ConfigGetString("stackedUnit") == "cm") //duct tape, at the moment
3418 {
3419 int MaxLength = ConfigGetInt("varQuantityMax");
3420 Weight = ((item_wetness + 1) * m_ConfigWeight * itemQuantity/MaxLength);
3421 }
3422 else if (itemQuantity != 1) //quantity determines weight of item without container (i.e. sardines in a can)
3423 {
3424 Weight = ((item_wetness + 1) * (m_ConfigWeight + itemQuantity));
3425 }
3426 else
3427 {
3428 Weight = ((item_wetness + 1) * m_ConfigWeight);
3429 }
3430 return Math.Round(Weight);
3431 }
3432
3433 override void UpdateWeight(WeightUpdateType updateType = WeightUpdateType.FULL, float weightAdjustment = 0)
3434 {
3435 //float itemWetness = GetWet() + 1;
3436 float current_quantity = GetQuantity();
3437 /*DumpStack();
3438 Print(this);
3439 Print("Initial weight: " + m_Weight);
3440 Print("Initial adjustement: " + weightAdjustment);
3441 Print("current_quantity: " + current_quantity);
3442 Print("updateType: " + updateType);*/
3443
3444 switch (updateType)
3445 {
3446 case WeightUpdateType.FULL:
3447 {
3448 int i = 0;
3449 float totalWeight;
3450 //float item_wetness = this.GetWet();
3451
3452 int AttachmentsCount = 0;
3453 CargoBase cargo;
3454
3455 /*Print("this: " + this);
3456 Print("GetInventory() " + GetInventory());
3457 Print("-----------------------------");*/
3458 if (GetInventory())
3459 {
3460 AttachmentsCount = GetInventory().AttachmentCount();
3461 cargo = GetInventory().GetCargo();
3462 }
3463
3464 //attachments?
3465 if (AttachmentsCount > 0)
3466 {
3467 for (i = 0; i < AttachmentsCount; i++)
3468 {
3469 totalWeight += GetInventory().GetAttachmentFromIndex(i).GetWeight();
3470 }
3471 }
3472
3473 //cargo?
3474 if (cargo != NULL )
3475 {
3476 for (i = 0; i < cargo.GetItemCount(); i++)
3477 {
3478 totalWeight += cargo.GetItem(i).GetWeight();
3479 }
3480 }
3481
3482 //other
3483 {
3484 if ( m_CanThisBeSplit ) //quantity determines size of the stack
3485 {
3486 totalWeight += /*Math.Round((item_wetness + 1) **/ this.GetQuantity() * m_ConfigWeight;
3487 //Print("this: " + this);
3488 //Print("this.GetQuantity(): " + this.GetQuantity());
3489 //Print("totalWeight: " + totalWeight);
3490 //Print("-----------------------------");
3491 }
3492 else if (this.ConfigGetString("stackedUnit") == "cm") //duct tape, at the moment
3493 {
3494 int MaxLength = GetQuantityMax();
3495 totalWeight += /*Math.Round(((item_wetness + 1) **/ m_ConfigWeight * (this.GetQuantity() / MaxLength);
3496 }
3497 else //quantity determines weight of item without container (i.e. sardines in a can)
3498 {
3499 totalWeight += /*Math.Round((item_wetness + 1) **/ (this.GetQuantity() + m_ConfigWeight);
3500 }
3501 }
3502
3503 m_Weight = Math.Round(totalWeight);
3504
3505 //Print("FULL");
3506 //Print("weightAdjustment: " + weightAdjustment);
3507 //Print("m_Weight: " + m_Weight);
3508 }
3509 break;
3510 case WeightUpdateType.ADD:
3511 m_Weight += weightAdjustment;
3512 //Print("ADD");
3513 //Print("weightAdjustment: " + weightAdjustment);
3514 //Print("m_Weight: " + m_Weight);
3515 break;
3516 case WeightUpdateType.REMOVE:
3517 m_Weight -= weightAdjustment;
3518 //Print("REMOVE");
3519 //Print("weightAdjustment: " + weightAdjustment);
3520 //Print("m_Weight: " + m_Weight);
3521 break;
3522 case WeightUpdateType.RECURSIVE_ADD:
3523 {
3524 if (weightAdjustment == 0) //First one in hierarchy
3525 {
3526 current_quantity = GetQuantity();
3527
3528 if ( m_CanThisBeSplit ) //quantity determines size of the stack
3529 {
3530 weightAdjustment = /*itemWetness **/ current_quantity * m_ConfigWeight;
3531 }
3532 else if (ConfigGetString("stackedUnit") == "cm") //duct tape, at the moment
3533 {
3534 weightAdjustment = /*itemWetness **/ m_ConfigWeight * (current_quantity / GetQuantityMax());
3535 }
3536 else //quantity determines weight of item without container (i.e. sardines in a can)
3537 {
3538 weightAdjustment = /*itemWetness **/ (current_quantity + m_ConfigWeight);
3539 }
3540
3541 weightAdjustment = Math.Round(weightAdjustment);
3542 }
3543 m_Weight += weightAdjustment;
3544
3545 //Print("RECURSIVE_ADD");
3546 //Print("weightAdjustment: " + weightAdjustment);
3547 //Print("m_Weight: " + m_Weight);
3548
3549 EntityAI hierarchyParent = GetHierarchyParent();
3550 if (hierarchyParent && !hierarchyParent.IsInherited(PlayerBase))
3551 hierarchyParent.UpdateWeight(WeightUpdateType.RECURSIVE_ADD, weightAdjustment);
3552 }
3553 break;
3554 case WeightUpdateType.RECURSIVE_REMOVE:
3555 {
3556 if (weightAdjustment == 0) //First one in hierarchy
3557 {
3558 current_quantity = GetQuantity();
3559
3560 if ( m_CanThisBeSplit ) //quantity determines size of the stack
3561 {
3562 weightAdjustment = /*itemWetness **/ current_quantity * m_ConfigWeight;
3563 }
3564 else if (ConfigGetString("stackedUnit") == "cm") //duct tape, at the moment
3565 {
3566 weightAdjustment = /*itemWetness **/ m_ConfigWeight * (current_quantity/GetQuantityMax());
3567 }
3568 else //quantity determines weight of item without container (i.e. sardines in a can)
3569 {
3570 weightAdjustment = /*itemWetness **/ (current_quantity + m_ConfigWeight);
3571 }
3572
3573 weightAdjustment = Math.Round(weightAdjustment);
3574 }
3575
3576 m_Weight -= weightAdjustment;
3577
3578 //Print("RECURSIVE_REMOVE");
3579 //Print("weightAdjustment: " + weightAdjustment);
3580 //Print("m_Weight: " + m_Weight);
3581
3582 EntityAI hp = GetHierarchyParent();
3583 if (hp && !hp.IsInherited(PlayerBase))
3584 hp.UpdateWeight(WeightUpdateType.RECURSIVE_REMOVE, weightAdjustment);
3585 }
3586 break;
3587 default:
3588 break;
3589 }
3590 }

3593 int GetNumberOfItems()
3594 {

3596 ItemBase item;
3597
3598 if ( GetInventory().GetCargo() != NULL )
3599 {
3600 item_count = GetInventory().GetCargo().GetItemCount();
3601 }
3602
3603 for ( int i = 0; i < GetInventory().AttachmentCount(); i++ )
3604 {
3605 Class.CastTo(item,GetInventory().GetAttachmentFromIndex(i));

3613 float GetUnitWeight(bool include_wetness = true)
3614 {
3615 float weight = 0;
3616 float wetness = 1;
3617 if (include_wetness)
3618 wetness += GetWet();

3620 {
3621 weight = wetness * m_ConfigWeight;
3622 }
3623 else if (ConfigGetFloat("liquidContainerType") > 0) //is a liquid container, default liquid weight is set to 1. May revisit later?
3624 {
3625 weight = 1;
3626 }
3627 return weight;

4073 // returns item's protection level against enviromental hazard, for masks with filters, returns the filters protection for valid filter, otherwise 0
4074 float GetProtectionLevel(int type, bool consider_filter = false, int system = 0)
4075 {
4076 if (IsDamageDestroyed() || (HasQuantity() && GetQuantity() <= 0) )
4077 {
4078 return 0;
4079 }
4080
4081 if( GetInventory().GetAttachmentSlotsCount() != 0 )//is it an item with attachable filter ?
4082 {
4083 ItemBase filter = ItemBase.Cast(FindAttachmentBySlotName("GasMaskFilter"));
4084 if (filter )
4085 {
4086 return filter.GetProtectionLevel(type, false, system);//it's a valid filter, return the protection
4087 }
4088 else return 0;//otherwise return 0 when no filter attached
4089 }
4090
4091 string subclass_path, entryName;
4092
4093 switch (type)
4094 {
4095 case DEF_BIOLOGICAL:
4096 entryName = "biological";
4097 break;
4098 case DEF_CHEMICAL:
4099 entryName = "chemical";
4100 break;
4101 default:
4102 entryName = "biological";
4103 break;
4104 }
4105
4106 subclass_path = "CfgVehicles " + this.GetType() + " Protection ";
4107
4108 return GetGame().ConfigGetFloat(subclass_path + entryName);
4109 }

4225 }

4480 void PlayAttachSound(string slot_type)
4481 {

4483 {
4484 if (ConfigIsExisting("attachSoundSet"))
4485 {
4486 string cfg_path = "";
4487 string soundset = "";
4488 string type_name = GetType();
4489
4490 TStringArray cfg_soundset_array = new TStringArray;
4491 TStringArray cfg_slot_array = new TStringArray;
4492 ConfigGetTextArray("attachSoundSet",cfg_soundset_array);
4493 ConfigGetTextArray("attachSoundSlot",cfg_slot_array);
4494
4495 if (cfg_soundset_array.Count() > 0 && cfg_soundset_array.Count() == cfg_slot_array.Count())
4496 {
4497 for (int i = 0; i < cfg_soundset_array.Count(); i++)
4498 {
4499 if (cfg_slot_array[i] == slot_type)
4500 {
4501 soundset = cfg_soundset_array[i];
4502 break;
4503 }
4504 }
4505 }
4506
4507 if (soundset != "")
4508 {
4509 EffectSound sound = SEffectManager.PlaySound(soundset, GetPosition());
4510 sound.SetAutodestroy( true );
4511 }
4512 }
4513 }

4569
4570 void ProcessItemWetness( float delta, bool hasParent, bool hasRootAsPlayer, ItemBase refParentIB )
4571 {
4572 if ( !hasRootAsPlayer )
4573 {
4574 if ( !hasParent )
4575 {
4576 // drying on ground
4577 if ( m_VarWet > m_VarWetMin )
4578 AddWet( delta * GameConstants.WETNESS_RATE_DRYING_GROUND );
4579 }
4580 else if ( refParentIB )
4581 {
4582 // parent is wet
4583 if ( ( refParentIB.GetWet() >= GameConstants.STATE_SOAKING_WET ) && ( m_VarWet < m_VarWetMax ) )
4584 AddWet( delta * GameConstants.WETNESS_RATE_WETTING_INSIDE );
4585 // parent has liquid inside
4586 else if ( ( refParentIB.GetLiquidType() != 0 ) && ( refParentIB.GetQuantity() > 0 ) && ( m_VarWet < m_VarWetMax ) )
4587 AddWet( delta * GameConstants.WETNESS_RATE_WETTING_LIQUID );
4588 // drying
4589 else if ( m_VarWet > m_VarWetMin )
4590 AddWet( delta * GameConstants.WETNESS_RATE_DRYING_INSIDE );
4591 }
4592 }
4593 }
4594
4595 void ProcessItemTemperature( float delta, bool hasParent, bool hasRootAsPlayer, ItemBase refParentIB )
4596 {
4597 if ( !hasRootAsPlayer )
4598 {
4599 if ( !hasParent )
4600 {
4601 // cooling on ground
4602 if ( ( GetTemperature() > GetTemperatureMin() ) && !IsFireplace() )
4603 AddTemperature( delta * GameConstants.TEMPERATURE_RATE_COOLING_GROUND );
4604 }
4605 else if ( refParentIB )
4606 {
4607 // cooling of an item inside other
4608 if ( ( GetTemperature() > GetTemperatureMin() ) && !IsFireplace() && ( GetTemperature() > refParentIB.GetTemperature() ) )
4609 AddTemperature( delta * GameConstants.TEMPERATURE_RATE_COOLING_INSIDE );
4610 }
4611 }
4612 }
4613
4614 // Backwards compatibility
4615 void ProcessItemWetnessAndTemperature( float delta, bool hasParent, bool hasRootAsPlayer, ItemBase refParentIB )
4616 {
4617 ProcessItemWetness(delta, hasParent, hasRootAsPlayer, refParentIB);
4618 ProcessItemTemperature(delta, hasParent, hasRootAsPlayer, refParentIB);
4619 }
4620
4621 void HierarchyCheck( out bool hasParent, out bool hasRootAsPlayer, out ItemBase refParentIB )
4622 {
4623 // hierarchy check for an item to decide whether it has some parent and it is in some player inventory
4624 EntityAI parent = GetHierarchyParent();
4625 if ( !parent )
4626 {
4627 hasParent = false;
4628 hasRootAsPlayer = false;
4629 }
4630 else
4631 {
4632 hasParent = true;
4633 hasRootAsPlayer = (GetHierarchyRootPlayer() != null);
4634 refParentIB = ItemBase.Cast( parent );
4635 }
4636 }

4667
4668 override void OnCEUpdate()
4669 {
4670 super.OnCEUpdate();
4671
4672 bool hasParent = false, hasRootAsPlayer = false;
4673 ItemBase refParentIB;
4674
4675 bool wwtu = g_Game.IsWorldWetTempUpdateEnabled();
4676 bool foodDecay = g_Game.IsFoodDecayEnabled();
4677
4678 if ( wwtu || foodDecay )
4679 {
4680 bool processWetness = wwtu && CanHaveWetness();
4681 bool processTemperature = wwtu && CanHaveTemperature();
4682 bool processDecay = foodDecay && CanDecay() && CanProcessDecay();
4683
4684 if ( processWetness || processTemperature || processDecay)
4685 {
4686 HierarchyCheck( hasParent, hasRootAsPlayer, refParentIB );
4687
4688 if ( processWetness )
4689 ProcessItemWetness( m_ElapsedSinceLastUpdate, hasParent, hasRootAsPlayer, refParentIB );
4690
4691 if ( processTemperature )
4692 ProcessItemTemperature( m_ElapsedSinceLastUpdate, hasParent, hasRootAsPlayer, refParentIB );
4693
4694 if ( processDecay )
4695 ProcessDecay( m_ElapsedSinceLastUpdate, hasRootAsPlayer );
4696 }
4697 }
4698 }

4749
4750EntityAI SpawnItemOnLocation (string object_name, notnull InventoryLocation loc, bool full_quantity)
4751{
4752 EntityAI entity = SpawnEntity(object_name, loc, ECE_IN_INVENTORY, RF_DEFAULT);
4753 if (entity)
4754 {
4755 bool is_item = entity.IsInherited( ItemBase );
4756 if ( is_item && full_quantity )
4757 {
4758 ItemBase item = ItemBase.Cast( entity );
4759 item.SetQuantity(item.GetQuantityInit());
4760 }
4761 }
4762 else
4763 {
4764 Print("Cannot spawn entity: " + object_name);
4765 return NULL;
4766 }
4767 return entity;
4768}
4769
4770void SetupSpawnedItem (ItemBase item, float health, float quantity)
4771{
4772 if (item)
4773 {
4774 if ( quantity == -1 )
4775 {
4776 if (item.HasQuantity())
4777 quantity = item.GetQuantityInit();
4778 }
4779
4780 if ( health > 0 )
4781 item.SetHealth("", "", health);
4782
4783 if ( quantity > 0 )
4784 {
4785 item.SetQuantity(quantity);
4786 }
4787 }
4788}
